name: Mikhail Akulov
description: Mikhail Sergeievich Akulov(Михаил Сергеевич Акулов) is afixerof theSoviet Unionwho travels toNight Cityin2077. Mikhail Akulov rose to fame as the topfixerin theSoviet Union. He traveled toNight Cityin 2077 under the pretext of a diplomatic business trip, but he was rumored to have been seduced by the freedom and capitalism the city brings. Neither story turned out to be true. Instead, Akulov's arrival in Night City was related to the Soviet Union andChinacompeting to secure a major arms deal withArasakathat would put the losing country at a severe military disadvantage.
